relatedBlades.title: Securing gaming and gambling companies against DDoS attacks
relatedBlades.subtitle: How network protection enables great player experiences
relatedBlades.copy:
Gaming and gambling organizations face significant challenges when it comes to securing their hybrid and multi-cloud networks against advanced threats. Because these networks are consumer-facing and always-on, even a few minutes of downtime can significantly impact both reputation and revenue. 

Unfortunately, gaming and gambling organizations remain a top target for DDoS attacks.

Read our guide to securing against DDoS attacks to learn how:
- Botnets are changing the DDoS game
- How DDoS attacks can threaten your revenue and reputation
- What you can do to prevent DDoS attacks from impacting player experiences
